verbs.description: The White House [V: has] refused to apologize after a communications aide said John McCain 's thoughts on Trump 's nomination for CIA director did n't matter because ' he 's dying anyway ' .

[ARG0: The White House] has [V: refused] [ARG1: to apologize] [ARGM-TMP: after a communications aide said John McCain 's thoughts on Trump 's nomination for CIA director did n't matter because ' he 's dying anyway '] .
[ARG0: The White House] has refused to [V: apologize] after a communications aide said John McCain 's thoughts on Trump 's nomination for CIA director did n't matter because ' he 's dying anyway ' .

The White House has refused to apologize after [ARG0: a communications aide] [V: said] [ARG1: John McCain 's thoughts on Trump 's nomination for CIA director did n't matter because ' he 's dying anyway '] .
The White House has refused to apologize after a communications aide said John McCain 's thoughts on Trump 's nomination for CIA director [V: did] n't matter because ' he 's dying anyway ' .

The White House has refused to apologize after a communications aide said [ARG1: John McCain 's thoughts on Trump 's nomination for CIA director] did [ARGM-NEG: n't] [V: matter] [ARGM-CAU: because ' he 's dying anyway '] .
The White House has refused to apologize after a communications aide said John McCain 's thoughts on Trump 's nomination for CIA director did n't matter because ' he [V: 's] dying anyway ' .
